subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Fernando Pisani and the Edmonton Oilers are one victory away from the Stanley Cup finals. Pisani's goal helped the Oilers withstand a late rally by the Anaheim Mighty Ducks, and Edmonton won Game 3 of the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Fernando Pisani and the Edmonton Oilers are one victory away from the Stanley Cup finals. Pisani's goal helped the Oilers withstand a late rally by the Anaheim Mighty Ducks, and Edmonton won Game 3 of the Western Conference finals.
